summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Banana Comb Hair Clips - Set of 4 Locking Clasp Hairclips Review Date: 2018/11/19 Store: The Paragon Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.4 x 2.6 x 0.9 inches; 0.81 Ounces'} Review Text: These work only if one has fine hair. I have shoulder length, really thick hair, and the first time I tried one of them, it totally broke in half. So now thy’ll go in the “X-Mas Socking Stuffer” bag. Review Title: Too Frail Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: New Look - The Fay Farm's Organic Healing Hemp Lotion - 8 oz. Review Date: 2018/11/20 Store: The Fay Farm, LLC Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'The Fay Farm, LLC', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '8 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.5 x 2.5 x 5.75 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '853618002405'} Review Text: I’ve had severe back aches for about 3 years now-sometimes where my back freezes up and I can’t even stand up. I’m sick of pills,so when I came upon this lotion, it was really amazing. I didn’t realize what it was advertised for, so I just thought it’s for relieving pain. My “mistake” ended up freeing me of muscle pain and back cramps. It smells great too (like lavender, even though there’s none in it).
It’s like a masseus in a bottle. Review Title: Great for Muscle Aches Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Soft & Dri Womens Soft scent Antiperspirant 3.5 fl oz/ 102g (Pack of 3) Review Date: 2019/11/15 Store: Soft & Dri Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Soft & Dri', 'Unit Count': '3.5 Ounce', 'Item Volume': '3.5 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 5.5 x 1.9 inches; 10.4 Ounces'} Review Text: I’ve been using this product since 1978, and I was totally bummed out when it was removed off the shelves.
It really keeps you dry, and smells so good.
I’m just glad to be able to buy it here. Review Title: Great 👍🏻 Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: VILLATONE Large Makeup Mirror with Lights and Magnification (Detachable Spot 10X Cosmetic Mirror). 360° Rotation. Touch Screen Brightness Dimming. Lighted Vanity Mirror for Make Up with LED Lighting Review Date: 2020/01/15 Store: VILLATONE Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'VILLATONE', 'Shape': 'Rectangular, Round', 'Frame Material': 'Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS)', 'Mounting Type': 'Countertop Mount, Tabletop Mount', 'Special Feature': 'magnifying, dimmable, lighted', 'Product Dimensions': '10 x 6 x 1 inches; 1.21 Pounds'} Review Text: This is the correct size, maneuverable, and sheds enough light to put on your makeup.
I didn’t receive the usb cord that was supposed to come with it, so I’ve had to use batteries, but that works as well. Review Title: It’s bright 💁🏻‍♀️ Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 4 Point Eyebrow Pen, Micro Ink Brow Pen Waterproof Eyebrow Pencil With Micro-Fork Tips for Daily Natural Eye Brown Makeup Review Date: 2020/07/14 Store: Lunana Beauty Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Lunana Beauty', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '2 x 1.2 x 0.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '763944352085'} Review Text: My hair is dyed an unusual color, and the dark gray pen looks so much better than the common brown one.
It’s just as easy to use as any other tattoo eyebrow pens, plus it’s waterproof.
I also received several other eyebrow tools that came with it.
It’s a terrific deal that’s really useful! Review Title: Great 🤗 Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Lime Crime 10th Birthday Unicorn Lipstick, Candy Floss - Long-Lasting Rose Pink Creamy Matte Lippie - 0.12oz Review Date: 2020/09/07 Store: Lime Crime Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Lime Crime', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.3 x 0.9 x 0.9 inches; 0.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '816652023669'} Review Text: This is the perfect bright pink shade ever!
It’s beautiful, and doesn’t fray around my lips.
I’ve purchased many lipsticks from Lime Crime, and they never disappoint! Review Title: Love it🤗 Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: KAJA Brow Blowout | Fiber Gel Brow Definer | Waterproof, Smudge-proof Brow Tint | 02 Soft Brown | Vegan, Cruelty-free, Paraben-free, Sulfate-free, K-Beauty Review Date: 2021/04/25 Store: Kaja Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Kaja', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Benefits': 'Smudge Proof,Softening', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '0.43 x 0.43 x 3.86 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '0.43 x 0.43 x 3.86 inches; 0.81 Ounces'} Review Text: This works better than the eyebrow “tattoo pens”.
It can be applied lightly, or thickly- and if it’s too thick or smears, I can blend it better, or wipe it off, with a q-tip.
It waterproof (great for sweaty/rainy days) but comes off, completely, with makeup remover, or face wash. Review Title: Great 👍🏻 Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Shopping Preferences and Trends:**

1. **Personal Care and Beauty Products**: The individual shows a strong preference for beauty and personal care items, indicating a focus on makeup, skincare, and grooming essentials.

2. **High Functionality and Effectiveness**: They prioritize products that are functional, high-performing, and specifically tailored to their needs, such as those addressing hair issues, skin ailments, and makeup application challenges.

3. **Scent Sensitivity**: The buyer exhibits a notable appreciation for pleasant scents in personal care products, as seen with the lotion and antiperspirant preferences.

4. **Quality over Quantity**: They tend to gravitate towards brands that consistently deliver quality and reliability, often repeating purchases from specific brands that meet their expectations.

5. **Innovative Features**: The buyer favors products with added features, such as waterproof or smudge-proof formulations, and innovative application methods that enhance usability.

6. **Disappointment with Discontinuation**: They express dissatisfaction when favored items are discontinued, highlighting brand loyalty and the importance of product availability.

7. **Aesthetic Appeal**: There is a clear interest in vibrant colors and shades in cosmetics, emphasizing a preference for products that offer both visual appeal and quality performance.

These trends suggest a consumer who values effective, aesthetically appealing personal care products while also leaning towards established brands that align with their beauty philosophy.

target_interaction.title: Light 👃🏼🥰
target_interaction.text:
This is a very light, spicy fragrance.
I have to pry open the roller ball, slightly, to get more out of the bottle (otherwise it barely comes out.)
features: True Blood Forsaken Eau De Parfum Rollerball Duo
Features Top Notes of Dark Blackberry, Anjou Pear, and Blood Orange.
Middle Notes: Night Blooming Jasmine, Sheer Violet, and Black Plum.
Base Notes: Ebony Wood, Amber Crystals, Patchouli, and Vanilla.
Packaging contains 2 Rollerballs (As Shown) - Manufacture Sealed
description: An irresistible mix of dark and light elements, Forsaken will have creatures of the night flocking to you like a vampire to faerie blood. This bewitching scent features top notes of dark blackberry, Anjou pear, and blood orange; middle notes of night blooming jasmine, sheer violet, and black plum; and bottom notes of ebony wood, amber crystals, patchouli, and vanilla. Enrobe yourself in Forsaken eau de parfum with this Roller Ball Duo, and effortlessly enchant everyone around you.

details.Special Feature: Gift, TSA Compliant, Travel Perfume, Rollerball Perfume
